acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offence Act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused absent.NBWA issued.
Accused Jaliluddin is absent with step which is allowed.
Accused Jaliluddin has appeared and prays to reman on previous bail vide petition no 3350/17.
Fixing for charge.

Accused Jalil Uddin is present.From the case record it appears that two accused persons namely Md. Mukesh Ali and Md. Salil are yet to be appeared and the case has been wrongly posted for consideration of charge as such issue W/A against accused Mukesh Ali and Md. Salim.
Accused is absent without any step. NBWA is issued against the accused.

Accused Jaliluddin and Muklesuddin are present. NBWA issued against Md. Selim has not yet returned. Issue fresh NBWA against him.Head Master, 370 Sonaribali Muktab School has not appeared. Issue summon to him to appear before the Court alongwith relevant admission register in respect of transfer certificate on 10-07-2018 copy of the school transfer certificate be enclosed with the summon.

Accused Jaliludin and Muklesuddin are present. NBWA has issued against Md. Selim has returned without execution. Reissue the same. Head Master, 370 Sonaribali Muktab School has not appeared. Issue summon to him to appear before the Court along with relevant admission register in respect of transfer certificate on 29-08-2018. Copy of the school transfer certificate be enclosed with the summon.
One PW is examined. Posted for order.

PO is on casual leave. Accused Jaliluddin and Muklesuddin are absent with step vide petition no. 2608/2018 and Petition no. 2611/2018 respectively. Prayers are allowed. Accused Salim is produced from jail hazot. Remanded till 24-09-2018 for production.

Accused Jaliluddin and Muklesuddin are present. Accused Salim is  produced from jail hazot. Remanded till 06-10-2018 for production. Seen bail petition (petition no. 2740/2018) moved on behalf of the accused Md. Salim. Heard both sides. Perused the case record. Bail petition stands rejected. Order on petition no. 861/2018 could not be passed today.

Md. Salimuddin is produced from custody. Accused Jaliluddin and Muklesuddin are present. Today is fixed for passing order on petition no. 861/2018 filed by Muklesuddin on the plea of junenility. The petitoner/ accused Muklesuddin vide petition no. 861/2018 submitted that on the date of occurrence his age was 16 years 9 months 3 days and as per school certificate his date of birth  is 20-01-2000 and as such prayed to pass necessary order. In support of the plea a School Transfer Certificate is also furnished in the court. Accordingly notice was issued to the Headmaster of 370 Sonaribali Muktab School to appear before this court along with relevant admission register in respect of the said transfer certificate issued on the name of Muklesuddin. In pursuance of the notice the Headmaster appeared along with the relevant registers.  The Court has examined the Headmaster as C.W.1. CW.1 Jiten Deka has exhibited Ext. A as the Admission Register.................................................................In view of above facts and circumstances, I hold that accused Muklesuddin AKA Muklesh Ali did not attain the age of 18 years at the time of occurance and he was juvenile in conflict-with-law on the date of occurrence. That being the position, I considered it to be fit to refer the case of Mukleswar Uddin to the court of JJB, Nagaon for trial of his case. Send relevant copies of the case record to the JJB, Nagaon. Juvenile Muklesuddin is directed to appear before the JJB, Nagaon on 22-10-2018. Send a copy of this order to the Principle Magistrate, Nagaon. Fix on 22-10-2018 for appearance before the JJB, Nagaon. Accused Salim Uddin is remanded to custody till 09-10-2018 for C/C.

Accused Salim Uddin is produced from jail hazot. Remanded till 23-10-2018 for production. Accused Md. Jalil is absent with step vide petition no. 2912/2018. Prayer is allowed. Seen bail petition ( Petition no. 2602/2018) moved on behalf of accused Md. Salim AKA Md. Salim. Heard both sides. Perused the case record. Considering the length of detention accused Md. Salim Uddin is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 20,000/- with on surety of the like amount i/d to custody.
